long_description: The great-fitting SportHill Marathon Shorts have a 4 in. inseam and are made from a quick-dry fabric that stretches for great range of motion when you're out for a long run. MicroLite Stretch polyester/spandex fabric dries fast to keep you comfortable when you're working up a sweat. Breathable liner is made from an airy mesh polyester/spandex fabric. 2 easy-access side drop pockets with rip-and-stick closures and a center back zippered pocket keep energy gels and snacks within reach. Stash your credit card or house key in the interior envelope pocket. Internal drawstring in the elastic waistband helps you fine-tune the fit. Reflective hits increase visibility in low light. Overstock.
